name: Chocolate Banana Cookies (Vegan, 4 Ingredients)
description: These chocolate banana cookies are incredibly easy and sooo delicious! You need only four ingredients to make them and they're completely sugar-free. One of my favorite snacks!
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon natural peanut butter (you can also use any other nut butter such as almond or cashew butter)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine all ingredients with a spoon.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, combine all ingredients with a spoon.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Line a baking tray with parchment paper and use a spoon to form 12 cookies (each portion should be about 1 1/2 tablespoons of the banana oat mixture).
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Line a baking tray with parchment paper and use a spoon to form 12 cookies (each portion should be about 1 1/2 tablespoons of the banana oat mixture).
